channel.title: I don't really know what I'm doing lol
channel.description: Recent content on I don't really know what I'm doing lol

item.title: LG UltraFine 5k on Linux and Windows
item.description: This is yet another post about attempting to get the LG UltraFine 5k working on Linux/Windows. TLDR: It works at a 4k resolution on my desktop and 5k from my Macbook Pro. Why are you doing this? The LG UltraFine 5k is a really gorgeous monitor that’s (unfortunately) a unique product in the market right now. There seems to be no other product with the following feature sets: A glossy panel 5k resolution Good color reproduction High DPI A single cable docking solution through Thunderbolt Doesn’t have a LOUD or GAMER design Camera, speakers, and mic built in The most attractive of above listed features is the ability to use the Monitor as a docking solution, where I can use a single cable and have all my peripherals be detected alongside it.

item.title: About
item.description: Just another software engineer blogging about Kubernetes, jazz, or whatever else interests me. Here have a disclaimer text This is my personal blog. The views expressed on these pages are mine alone and not those of my employer. I may post incorrect things on here or just opinions. At times, you may not agree with these opinions, or how I choose to express them and that’s fine. I make no promises of being free of bias, nor do I promise to be always factually correct.

item.title: My First blog post
item.description: This is my blog, I hope to post some useful information for other folks hacking at various things here and work on my writing skills. …There’s not much here yet, but look forward to some more content!
